original_text: My Christian friends, God has been very kind to us. Because of that, I really want you to serve God with your whole life. Offer your bodies to him like a sacrifice that continues to live. Serve him with everything that you have and that will please him. That is the true way to worship God.
korean_text: 그러므로 형제들아 내가 하나님의 모든 자비하심으로 너희를 권하노니 너희 몸을 하나님이 기뻐하시는 거룩한 산 제물로 드리라 이는 너희가 드릴 영적 예배니라

sentences.original_text: My Christian friends, God has been very kind to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 나의 그리스도인 친구들에게, 하나님은 우리에게 매우 친절하셨습니다.

sentences.original_text: Because of that, I really want you to serve God with your whole life.
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇기 때문에, 나는 너희가 온전한 삶으로 하나님을 섬기기를 정말로 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: Offer your bodies to him like a sacrifice that continues to live.
sentences.korean_translation: 살아있는 제물처럼 너희의 몸을 그에게 드리십시오.

sentences.original_text: Serve him with everything that you have
sentences.korean_translation: 너희가 가진 모든 것으로 그를 섬기십시오

sentences.original_text: That is the true way to worship God.
